channel.title: New England anthology
channel.description:
A series featuring New England poets who read and discuss their own works.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Robert Hillyer and John Holmes
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Robert Hillyer and John Holmes.
item.dc:creator: Kohler, Stanley
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Frank Prentice Rand & David Morton
item.description: This program focuses on Amherst poets Frank Prentice Rand and David Morton
item.dc:creator: University of Massachusetts
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Richard Eberhart and Peter Viereck
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Richard Eberhart and Peter Viereck.
item.dc:creator: Haven, Richard
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Robert Francis and Arnold Kenseth
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Robert Francis and Arnold Kenseth.
item.dc:creator: University of Massachusetts
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Richard Wilbur and John Ciardi
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Richard Wilbur and John Ciardi.
item.dc:creator: Tucker, Robert
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Archibald MacLeish
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Archibald MacLeish, who is present to read some of his works.
item.dc:creator: University of Massachusetts
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Emily Dickinson
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Emily Dickinson, with readings by Dickinson scholar Stephen Whicher.
item.dc:creator: University of Massachusetts
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.

item.title: Wallace Stevens
item.description: This program focuses on the poetry of Wallace Stevens, who is present to read some of his works.
item.dc:creator: University of Massachusetts
item.dc:subject: New England--Poetry.
